### Spack version

$ spack --version
0.14.0-20-8d8925c72
```

spack install -j1 paraview@5.4.1+qt+python ^mesa~llvm ^python@2.7.16 ^sqlite+column_metadata ^py-pillow@6.2.2 ^qt@4.8.7 ^openssl@1.0.2t

```
